title: Client patcher keeps freezing.
body:
I uninstalled And attempt to reinstall LoL due to repeaded technical difficulties but the patch installing process keeps freezing between 40% - 55%. Worse, it also freezes my pc too. I tried restarting my pc, accessed different wireless connections and restarted the installation a total of 7 times and even uninstalled and reinstalled again. Yet it just keeps freezing my everything.

No way the applying patch duration remains at 42 minutes for over 8 hours.

replies.body: It kind of sounds like your installation is hitting a rough spot around the 50% mark, possibly caused by files that weren't completely or properly uninstalled. Try grabbing this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a clean uninstall, then try running the installation one more time with an ethernet connection.
